Description: list of conversion technologies included in the optimization
list of storage technologies included in the optimization
list of retrofitting technologies included in the optimization
list of transport technologies included in the optimization
per default a brownfield optimization is conducted, by setting this parameter to ``False``existing technology capacities are ignored and a greenfield optimization is conducted
per default all nodes are selected, however, by overwriting the empty list value you can condi√∫ct the optimization for a subset of subset of nodes
per default only the optimization is only conducted for the default sceanrio, set to ``True`` to conduct scenario analysis
per default the total hours per year are set to 8760, overwrite this parameter if you want to investigate a shorter period
per default the number of unaggregated timesteps is set to 8760
per default the time-series-aggregation (TSA) is conducted, set to ``False``to skip the TSA
per default the TSA aggregates the number of time-steps to 10, overwrite this value to increase or decrease the intra-yearly temporal resolution
per default the reference year is set to 2023
per default, the optimization is conducted for 3 years, change this value to investigate shorter or longer time horizons
per default, the optimization is conducted for each year, change this value to only investigate every second (2) year or every third (3) year, etc.
